column4: Hey guys I'm having an issue with my nvidia driver and I'm having to restort to low graphics mode.  I'm not really sure how to fix it...
I think ubuntu 10.04 comes with default drivers
I was using whatever 10.04 suggested when I installed it
hey check this may help you http://ubuntuguide.org/wiki/Ubuntu:Lucid#Install_Latest_Nvidia.2FATI_drivers
